alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Elder County through 315 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles southwest of Oakley Reservoir to 15 miles east of Montello. Movement was north at 45 mph. Additional strong thunderstorms are southeast of Park Valley, heading northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Etna, Standrod, Grouse Creek, Lynn, Curlew Junction, Lucin, Rosette and Yost. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 1 and 3. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.
